name: Try To Escape
description:
Try To Escape - Out Now!

Are you ready to enter this epic detective story and prove your room escape skills?

This classy escape game brings the classical Noir atmosphere into your hands. Try to solve puzzles, pick locks and most important - find your way to escape.

If you believe you have what it takes to finish this detective story go on and download the game now!

Game features:
Noir graphics!
Tricky situations.
Mind blowing puzzles.
Genuine detective story.
9 free levels!

Start your room escape now!
